transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello haanji sir ji.
Customer: Ye maine aapke whatsapp pe bheje hai dekho aap aapka result.
Executive: Theek hai Tamilnadu ki ek lead ho gayi.
Customer: Ho sakta hai aapke pass time hai ya nahi hai dekhne ke liye par mai bata raha hu aapko dekh lo.
Customer: Time ki baat nahi hai sir sab aata hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi aapke pass time bahut time hai aur kaamo ke liye hoga ho sakta hai mere kaam ke liye nahi hai.
Customer: Hota toh meri ye problem hai sort out ho jati.
Executive: Sir pata koi mai ek cheez batata hu dekho sir.
Customer: System system nahi system me ye karne me kitna time hota hai mai purchase karu mai toh sari cheeze turant turant ho jayengi.
Executive: Sir ek kaam karta hu aap ticket ko wohi rakhiye mai isko mai registration pe dal deta hu jo mai.
Customer: Nahi mai mai mai mai intzaar karne walo me se nahi hu jab tak karta hu jab tak theek hai.
Executive: Sir mere mere aapne maine kal dekh ke mera dimag kharab ho raha hai ye aapne kal bhi sham ko bola tha ki mai aapko call karke OTP leke inko sabko sahi kar lunga.
Customer: Par mai ek cheez dekho aap ek cheez dekho aap.
Executive: Ek second rukiye aapko lag raha hai na ki maine kuch nahi kara ek second rukiye aap.
Customer: Abhi mai aapko ek cheez bhejta hu ye aap dekhiye aapko jaise lag raha hai ki kya kehte hai mai bas hawa me baate karta hu aapse bas kaam nikla aur khatam.
Executive: Ek kaam hota toh mujhe dikh jata na mai result dal raha hu turant turant.
Customer: Ek second lijiye bas maine aapko ye dekho video start kar diya maine abhi aapki tip bana raha hu ye dekho not preferred location hota hai jaha usme likh bhi raha kya hai you do not preferred buylead from this location.
Customer: Mysore ye dekho sari location theek hai jaha jaha se aapko nahi chahiye.
Customer: Bhai aapko nahi chahiye waha waha ki maine sari location ko dal diya uske andar.
Executive: Hmm ek baar aap aaram se dekh lijiye na aapko lag raha hoga mai fir bhi aapko.
Customer: Mai toh aaram se puch ke dekhunga jisse mera ye sari location hai mere wo lead band ho jayegi jaha ki mujhe chahiye waha ki de do mere ko aap isliye kahenge teen mahine se mere ko bewakoof bana rahe the abhi kal mere ko pata chal gayi hai toh ab uska kya kehte hai pata nahi kaunsi team aapki aake karegi.
Customer: Nahi purchase karte 10 minute me shuru kar dete ho sari cheeze.
Executive: Sir maine aapko bola tha.
Customer: Naya purchase kare meri baate kadwi lag rahi hai par sachai real hai ye.
Executive: Kya sir aap kyun nahi.
Customer: Nahi naya cheez purchase kare toh turant chalu ho jati hai sari cheeze only 10 minute me.
Customer: Hmm toh ye pura purane exit customer ki kyun nahi ho rahi hai ye problem sahi.
Customer: Aisi kaunsi cheez hai jo aapke yaha technician nahi hai.
Customer: Hain hmm kya aapki baat nahi samajhna ho toh mere ko number de dijiye un senioro ke mai baat karu.
Executive: Meri baat suniye mai senior se baat karwa raha hu aap direct baat kariye theek hai jo bhi solution hota hai unse direct baat kariye theek hai sir.
Customer: Direct jawab de mai unke kya kehte hai mai khatkhata dunga lao meri baat karao na aapke jo manager baithe hai waha.
Executive: Mai kya keh raha hu mai aapko direct baat hi karwa deta hu sir theek hai jo bhi hoga aapko jo bhi dekho mai sari cheeze ek baar bata deta hu fir bhi jo bhi aapko issue aa raha hai ek baar aap bata do kitna bada koi woh nahi hai ki kya kehte hai isme itna bada koi issue hai.
Customer: Kitna bada issue nahi hai teen mahine se kuch nahi aa raha business bani kitna bada kyun nahi hai.
Customer: Par isko sahi kar do isko sahi.
Executive: Sir toh sir ek cheez dekhiye na aap aapko jo IndiaMART ka system buylead show karega na maan ke chalo agar aap filter woh jo location ka filter hai na usme Rajasthan dalo Rajasthan ki jab koi lead hi nahi hai toh aapko kya dikhayega.
Customer: Mai in cheezo ko dalta hi rahunga kya kyun nahi hai kal proof de dunga mai kaha ki kitni lead aa rahi hai abhi ja raha hu mai.
Customer: Mai dusre dusre uske kya kehte hai mai jo subscriber hai uske sari detail de dunga.
Executive: Haan haan mai aap ek kaam karo paas buylead me jao theek hai ek baar dekhiye Rajasthan ki pehli jo lead aayi thi pichli jo lead aayi thi na paas buylead me paanch din pehle aayi thi Rajasthan se lead.
Customer: Hmm aap ek kaam karo koi dikkat nahi aap ek baar jao dusre subscriber ke pass jo aap bol rahe ho ek baar aap pucho usko Rajasthan ki kitni lead aa rahi hai.
Customer: Abhi mai aapke andar screenshot hi dalunga mai unse.
Executive: Koi dikkat nahi aap screenshot leke dal dena aap koi dikkat nahi sir.
Customer: Mujhe haan.
Executive: Aap ek baar mujhe naam bhi mat batao aap kal jana ek baar aap aaram se puch lena theek hai agar aisa nahi hai ki aapko nahi aa rahi hai dusre ko aayegi aisa kisi ke sath nahi hota sir.
Customer: Oh nahi mai ye sari ki sari game mai samajh gaya suno ab kya hai ki aapko bura lag raha hoga par mai game samajh gaya IndiaMART ki bahut achchi tarah se achchi tarah se ye ye game khela gaya hai mere sath.
Customer: Sach me kyunki aapki na toh madam ko aawaz aati hai kaano me tel dal rahi thi.

Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving buyleads from preferred locations.

- Believes he is being fooled for 3 months.

- Expresses frustration with customer support.



Resolution:

- Executive shared a video showing preferred locations.

- Executive offered to connect with senior management.

- Executive suggested checking with other subscribers.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location, subscription, customer support
